overview: Notorious photographer David Lamm breaks free from behind the camera to direct the video that's been playing in his twisted head for twenty years. An astonishing directorial debut, Twisted stars Kent North and nine other unbelievably sexy fist dogs who get blindfolded, gagged, caged, gang-banged, forced, used, abused, tattooed, and twisted. The world's first handball two disc set, Twisted clocks in at a whopping three hours of nonstop, punchfuck Club Inferno action, including a one-hour gangbang on disc two that'll make your eyes cross. This is the undisputed handball event of 2005. Get Twisted!
title: Twisted
